eu_initiatives:
Regulation 1107/2009 on the placing on the market of plant protection products, and all related files, such as: 
- Uniform Principles, 
- Labelling Requirements, 
- Data requirements for substances and products, 
- Basic substances, 
- Low Risk substances, 
- Candidates for substitution and Comparative Assessment, 
- Approval Criteria, 
- conditions and restrictions, 
- Endocrine Disruptors, 
- Developmental Neurotoxicity and Immunotoxicity, 
- Zonal Authorisations and worksharing, 
- Mutual Recognition of authorisations, 
- Harmonisation of Memberstate specific requirements, 
- Renewal of approvals and authorisations, 
- coformulants and adjuvants, 
- safeners and synergists, 
- Dossier formatting, 
- Data Protection, 
- Procedural and Technical Guidance covering the provisions of the Regulation 
 
Regulation 396/2005 on maximum residu levels of pesticides in food and feed; 
 
Directive 2009/128 on the sustainable use of pesticides; 
 
Directive 2009/127 on machinery for pesticide application; 
 
Regulation 1272/2008 on Classification, Labelling and Packaging of substances and mixtures (CLP Regulation); 
 
Regulation 1907/2006 , REACH Regulation 
 
Regulation 649/2012 on import/export of dangerous chemicals, the PIC-Regulation; 
 
Regulation 178/2002 Foodlaw; 
 
Legislation on: 
- Intellectual Property, 
- Public Access to information (incl. so-called Aarhus Regulation), 
- pesticides allowed in organic agriculture 
- fertilisers and biostimulants 
- soil and water policy
